metadata.title: SKT T1 Womens Bikini Set Two Piece Bathing Suits for Women Halter Triangle Bikini Tops Tie Bottoms Underwear Swimsuit
features: High-Quality Material Bikini: Women's blue flame dragons bathing suits material is 86% polyester + 14% spandex. Smooth fabric beachwear are very stretchy, soft, comfortable and durable, pleasantly cool, quick drying. Bikini sets are a must for summer.

Multiple Sizes Triangle Bikini: S-XXL. Small size fits AB cup; medium size fits BC cup; large size fits C cup; X size fits D cup; XX size fits EF cup. It's adjustable string on the neck, back and bottom. Please refer to our detailed size chart for measurements to find the best size for you!

Sling Swimsuits Design: Women's blue flame dragons bikini with adjustable criss cross halter tops and tie side bottoms, plunging neckline, high cut, padding push-up.The 2 piece blue flame dragons bikini sets offer moderate coverage and good tummy control while enhancing the look, showing charming curves. Simple but brazilian style swimwear is suitable for all types of body, convenient for underwater activities.

Underwear Suit for Many Occasions: The blue flame dragons bikini set for women ladies girls are perfect for sports or training, yachting, surfing, beach, swimming pool, spa, pool party, honeymoon, summer hawaii vacation and other water activities. Cute and make a deadly combo and the beautiful bikini set is here to prove it. Bikini is also the Best holiday gift for wife, girlfriend, mom on birthday, mother's day, women's day.
Care Instructions: Regular wash, hand washable, machine washable, no bleaching, and the temperature of washing solution should not exceed 45 â„ƒ. Do not tumble dry.
description: We are devoted to offering high standard in swimwear for women girls ladies with exquisite design.;

Soak up the sun with these stunning beachwear and become a beach bikini hottie.
